#
# Baron et al. 2012, ApJ, 752, 20 Table 3
# Position Estimates of Algol B and Algol C Relative to Algol A
#
# Units:
#   MJD: days
#   rho_X: mas
#   theta_X: degrees
#   sig_xX: mas
#   psi_X: mas
#
# All angles are given east of north. rho_B and theta_B are the polar
# coordinates of Algol B, while sigma_a, B, sigma_b, B, and psi_B are,
# respectively, the semimajor axis, semiminor axis, and angular
# inclination of its error ellipse.
#
# only kept MJD for the observation date
#
MJD          chi^2/dof  rho_B   theta_B sig_aB  sig_bB  psi_B   rho_C   theta_C sig_aC  sig_bC  psi_C
